subject: Special offer
body:
Dear customer.
The pharmacy you shop at got too expensive? Why spend more if you have the opportunity to buy medications of the same generic quality for less?
Praise the Canadian government and its drug sales taxation system. At CanadianPharmacy you will be able to purchase 100% drugs at a price much lower than that in any USA online pharmacy. CanadianPharmacy we sell the best and don't charge too much for real quality.
Hope that you find this advice useful. CanadianPharmacy is waiting.
Best regards,Lottie Griggs
